name: Jet Lag Overnight Eye Serum for Fine Lines & Wrinkles with Gentle Retinol Blend
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is: An overnight eye serum that hydrates, and with a gentle retinoid blend, visibly minimizes fine lines for a smoother, firmer look...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Puffiness..Highlighted Ingredients:- Glycerin: Attracts and locks in moisture that helps skin feel soft and supple..- Retinol and Retinyl Linoleate: Improves the appearance of fine lines and is gentle for all skin types..- Licorice Root Extract: Soothes the look of irritation and reduces the look of puffiness...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This nourishing nighttime eye serum is the newest addition to the Jet Lag franchise, powered by super-hydrating glycerin, barrier-supporting ceramides, and a gentle retinoid blend to visibly minimize fine lines for a hydrated and smoother looku2014 leaving skin texture less crepey- and more even-looking...Clinical Results: In an independent clinical study, with 31 participants aged 32u201360:.- 100% showed a significant improvement in fine lines and wrinkles after 2 weeks of use.- 94% showed a significant improvement in skin hydration after 4 weeks of use.- 97% showed a significant improvement in firmness after 2 weeks of use..In an independent consumer use study, with 31 participants aged 32u00adu201360, after 4 weeks:.- 96% agreed that after using this serum, the skin around their eyes has a visibly smoother texture.- 96% agreed that after using this serum, the texture of the skin around their eye area appears less crepey and more even..CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Glycerin: Attracts and locks in moisture that helps skin feel soft and supple..-Retinol and Retinyl Linoleate: Improves the appearance of fine lines and is gentle for all skin types..-Licorice Root Extract: Soothes the look of irritation and reduces the look of puffiness....Glycerin, Water/Aqua/Eau, Squalane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Pentylene Glycol, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Propanediol, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Ceramide NP, Bisabolol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran Extract, Glycyrrhetinic Acid, Centella Asiatica Extract, Phospholipids, Retinyl Linoleate, Retinol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Gluconolactone, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Lecithin, Maltodextrin, Potassium Sorbate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Levulinic Acid, Sodium Levulinate, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-In the evening, gently apply a small amount around the contour of each eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. I had to stop using recently because I got pregnant but I miss it everyday. Now I use the jet lag mask on my under eyes but itu2019s not as good. This is so hydrating and made my under eyes much smoother in texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I promise I gave this a proper try. It feels so good going on but it irritates my eye area too much causing it to feel drier than normal in the AM. It also broke me out on the side my face that I sleep on.
